name: C Y B Ξ R
description: C Y B Ξ R UserBot is the most advantageous and fast UserBot with changeable language and permanent plugin system.

SPOTIFY_DC.description: The code needed for Spotify bio.

SPOTIFY_KEY.description: The code needed for Spotify bio.

HEROKU_MEMEZ.description: This value must be True if UserBot is running on a Heroku Dyno.

HEROKU_APIKEY.description: Heroku API Key, get this value from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

HEROKU_APPNAME.description: Type heroku app name (Helps keep your boot up to date.)

GENIUS.description: Type the Genius API Token you got here.

AUTO_PP.description: It is the variable required for the AutoPP module to work. You need to enter the direct address of the image you will use for it to work.

BOTLOG_CHATID.description: ChatID of the log group. Set to '0' if BOTLOG = False and/or LOGSPAMMER = False.

CONSOLE_LOGGER_VERBOSE.description: If you need the detail in the console log, set it to True.

PM_AUTO_BAN.description: PM Auto Ban Feature. 'Hey! It's a bot.' module.

PM_AUTO_BAN_LIMIT.description: PM Auto Ban limit. If users send you x messages, they will be blocked.

YOUTUBE_API_KEY.description: YouTube Data API key for .yt command. Get it at https://console.cloud.google.com.

ANTI_SPAMBOT.description: He kicks spambots from groups after joining. [Requires admin privileges to kick]

ANTI_SPAMBOT_SHOUT.description: If you don't have admin privileges to kick, report spambots to admins after joining the group.

TMP_DOWNLOAD_DIRECTORY.description: Download location for many modules (GDrive, .download etc.)

CLEAN_WELCOME.description: When a new person joins, the old welcome message is deleted.

G_DRIVE_CLIENT_ID.description: Enter the client id for Google Drive.

LASTFM_API.description: API Key for Last.FM module. [Get one from - https://www.last.fm/api/account/create]

LASTFM_SECRET.description: SECRET Key for Last.FM module. [Get one from - https://www.last.fm/api/account/create]

G_DRIVE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Enter the client secret for Google Drive.

G_DRIVE_AUTH_TOKEN_DATA.description: Enter Google Drive authentication data as JSON structure.

WEATHER_DEFCITY.description: Set the default city for UserBot's weather module.

LOGSPAMMER.description: Set this value to True if you want error logs to be stored in the UserBot log group instead of sending the file in the current chat. (Requires a valid BOTLOG_CHATID value to be set.)

WARN_LIMIT.description: The number of alerts required to gmute/gban the user. (Usually 3 is used.)

WARN_MODE.description: The event that will occur after 3 warnings. You can just type gmute or gban. Otherwise the bot may not work.

GALERI_SURE.description: It is for gallery plugin. How many seconds should profile photos change?

PAKET_ISMI.description: Specify the syntax command package name. The package name will be: The value you give @UserName is 1

OTOMATIK_KATILMA.description: If you do not want to join the support group, write False here.
